preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM cvterm where cvterm_id='1705' and name='CROSS-FEMALE GID'

changeSet.sql: UPDATE cvterm SET name='FEMALE PEDIGREE', definition='Pedigree of female parent' where cvterm_id='1705'

changeSet.author: mderamos

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM cvterm where cvterm_id='1707' and name='CROSS-MALE GID'

changeSet.sql: UPDATE cvterm SET name='MALE PEDIGREE', definition='Pedigree of male parent' where cvterm_id='1707'
